message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $6000, you take $4000.  This way we both benefit from ending the game quickly.
I think we can do better.  I'm willing to split the money more evenly, but I want to keep a slight edge since I have to deal with the bigger inflation.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  I'll be generous and take a smaller cut than my previous offer, but this is my final word.  Every round that passes hurts you more than it hurts me.
